timeline.bodyText:
Mind adding a docs tag to that method to explain why it's cancelled?
For future reference in case someone stumbles across this and gets confused
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.author: poma123

replies.bodyText: Yeah, but you forgot the @return tag and you could make "Magical Zombie Pills" an @link too :)
